channel.title: Sharding on ShardingSphere
channel.description: Recent content in Sharding on ShardingSphere

item.title: SHOW SHARDING ALGORITHM IMPLEMENTATIONS
item.description: Description The SHOW SHARDING ALGORITHM IMPLEMENTATIONS syntax is used to query all the implementations of the interface org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.spi.ShardingAlgorithm. Syntax Grammar Railroad diagram showShardingAlgorithmImplementations ::= 'SHOW' 'SHARDING' 'ALGORITHM' 'IMPLEMENTATIONS' Return Value Description Columns Description type type type_aliases type aliases description description Example Query all the implementations for org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.spi.ShardingAlgorithm interface SHOW SHARDING ALGORITHM IMPLEMENTATIONS SHOW SHARDING ALGORITHM IMPLEMENTATIONS; +----------------+--------------+-------------+ | type | type_aliases | description | +----------------+--------------+-------------+ | MOD | | | | HASH_MOD | | | | VOLUME_RANGE | | | | BOUNDARY_RANGE | | | | AUTO_INTERVAL | | | | INTERVAL | | | | CLASS_BASED | | | | INLINE | | | | COMPLEX_INLINE | | | | HINT_INLINE | | | +----------------+--------------+-------------+ 10 rows in set (0.
